feed.title: Immich Kiosk Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Immich Kiosk: v0.6.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

User friendly time layouts

Implement the (IMO) more user friendly date layout "YYYY-MM-DD"

You can use the below values to create your preferred date layout.

| Value | Example output | |-------------|--------------| | YYYY | 2024 | | YY | 24 | | MMMM | August | | MMM | Aug | | MM | 08 | | M | 8 | | DDDD | Monday | | DDD | Mon | | DD | 04 | | D | 4 |

Date layout examples

These examples assume that today's date is the 22nd of August 2024.

  • "YYYY-MM-DD" => "2024-08-22"
  • "YYYY/MM/DD" => "2024/08/22"
  • "YYYY:MM:DD" => "2024:08:22"
  • "YYYY MM DD" => "2024 08 22"
  • "YY M DDD" => "24 8 Thur"
  • "YY MMM DDDD" => "24 Aug Thursday"
  • "YYYY MMMM DDDD DD" => "2024 August Thursday 22"

Releasing GO binaries

Added GO binaries to releases for those want to bypass Docker.

What's Changed

ðŸš€ New Features

  • Easier date layout for users by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/36

Other changes

  • Add Goreleaser to create GO binaries by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/37

Full Changelog: https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/compare/v0.5.0...v0.6.0

entry.title: New release for Immich Kiosk: v0.7.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

Pausing Kiosk

Clicking/tapping on Kiosk will pause the refresh timer. Clicking/tapping again will reset and restart the timer.

Added devices history

Each devices now stores past images (currently limited to 10 entries). This is setting the base for future endeavours ðŸ‘€.

Added disable_screensaver option

Setting disable_screensaver to true will ask the browser to request that the device does not dim the screen, activate screensaver or lock the device.

Added hide_cursor option

Setting hide_cursor to true will hide the cursor/mouse.

Colourful debug logging

Debug mode now colours each request ID differently (generated from the request ID string) for easier log scanning. Added prettier Config logging output.

Stopped archived images from displaying

ðŸš€ New Features

  • Clicking/tapping on Kiosk will pause the refresh timer. Clicking/tapping again will reset and restart the timer.
  • Added in page history by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/50
  • Added Disable screensaver config option by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/51
  • Add hide_cursor option by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/53

âš¡ Fixes

  • Improved per request logging and excluding archived images by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/41
  • Fix bug where archived images would show by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/47

ðŸ““ Documentation

  • Removed obsolete raw query support by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/52

ðŸ”¨ Maintenance

  • Utilising Echo bind by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/48
  • Reworked how Kiosk manages cache memory to have a smaller footprint
  • Reworked how config defaults are initiated. They are now set via struct tags vs vipers Bind

Other changes

  • Remove route init function in favour of passing config instance by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/42
  • Update README.md by @brayStorm in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/39

New Contributors

  • @brayStorm made their first contribution in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/39

Full Changelog: https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/compare/v0.6.0...v0.7.0

entry.title: New release for Immich Kiosk: v0.7.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

Fix

This patch is mainly to fix the error shipped in 0.7.0 that caused the image refresh loop to stop working ðŸ˜…

ðŸš€ New Features

  • Fullscreen icon now shows when Kiosk it paused (by clicking/tapping Kiosk) NOTE: This is mainly for desktop browsers and will most likely not work in mobile browsers.

âš¡ Fixes

  • Polling fix broken by 0.7.0 by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/61

Other changes

  • Add tag to enable fullscreen PWA on iOS by @njspix in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/55
  • Fixed typo in readme regarding docker env var for disabling screensaver by @rw15e in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/56
  • docs: update README.md by @eltociear in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/58

New Contributors

  • @njspix made their first contribution in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/55
  • @rw15e made their first contribution in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/56
  • @eltociear made their first contribution in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/58

entry.title: New release for Immich Kiosk: v0.7.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

Fixed a error when using the password functionality after the move from a GET to a POST request in 0.7.0

âš¡ Fixes

  • look for password in correct data source

entry.title: New release for Immich Kiosk: v0.8.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

Added show_image_exif option

Setting this to true will display the images f number, shutter speed, focal length, ISO if available.

Added show_image_location option

Setting this to true will display the images location if available.

Added a play/pause button to menu

For better UX

Moved refresh loop from Javascripts setInterval to requestAnimationFrame

The refresh loop and progress bar are now driven by requestAnimationFrame. This is mainly for better control over the refresh loop and performance.

ðŸš€ New Features

  • Option to display image metadata (f number, shutter speed, focal length, ISO)
  • Option to display location
  • Play/pause button added to menu
  • Refresh loop migrated from setInterval to animationFrame

âš¡ Fixes

  • Visible input on startup fix
  • Fullscreen icon in menu no longer shows if browser does not support it
  • Safari SVG not displaying fix

ðŸ”¨ Maintenance

  • UI is more friendly to smaller screens
  • Setting KIOSK_DEBUG to true will add htmx event logs to the front end
